## InterfaceTypeSchema.indexSignature property

Index Signature `undefined` represents no index signature, i.e. excess property is not allowed. { \[key: string\]: xxx }

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
indexSignature?: {
        keyType: 'String' | 'Number';
        type: TSBufferSchema;
    };
```
